articles.title: Subnautica 2’s creators sue their publisher for ‘severely’ damaging the game’s release - The Verge
articles.description: The former executives of Subnautica 2 developer Unknown Worlds have filed a lawsuit against publisher Krafton alleging it sabotaged the game’s development.
